entry.title: I promise I'll do better
entry.summary:
Author: lucy_star02

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,726Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 11

Summary: This is a story about family, about the fear of losing someone or a connection, and the desire to try again. It’s about love and understanding, about how even the coldest people need care and support. Let’s just say that Bruce Wayne needs help. Or Bruce catches a cold and feels depressed because it’s his mother’s birthday. Clark takes care of him. Dick gets a call and he asks Jason to go. Damian is jealous of Kori and Tim just wants to make Bruce proud. Everyone gets the love they needed. English is not my first language, so if there are any mistakes, I apologize.

entry.title: Temptation is One Hell of a Thing
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,107Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 178

Summary: Bruce Wayne never expected to walk into a church again—let alone with his four-year-old son in his arms. But when a meeting with Clark Kent, a priest. It turns into more than polite conversation, Bruce finds himself disarmed by a man who shouldn’t have surprised him at all. Clark is broad-shouldered, and impossibly kind; a believer in things Bruce turned his back on the day of his parents’ funeral.Bruce is skeptical, Clark is steadfast. Their ideologies clash from the moment they sit across from one another: billionaire pragmatism versus the faith of a priest. But somewhere between coloring books at Clark’s desk and quiet invitations to community fairs, a dangerous warmth grows. Bruce doesn’t know how to name it, and Clark doesn’t dare.Because whatever is happening between them—it shouldn’t. Bruce pushes, searching for the language he can’t bring himself to say aloud, while Clark whispers what he shouldn’t confess at all: I can’t. A vow binds him to the Church, but his heart betrays him in every secret meeting, every glance held too long.It shouldn’t work. It can’t work. But it does. And as much Clark Kent prays, temptation seeps through.

entry.title: Find A Balance
entry.summary:
Author: wolfsanctity

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,868Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 99

Summary: “Who are you, Bruce?” “What?” His brow furrows, lip curling up slightly with the question as he answers with confusion. It came out of nowhere to him, but judging by the look on the other’s face and the way he delivered it, that’d been brewing for a while. “Who are you, really? Without the suit on? With the mask on?” Clark steps closer, towering over the other man. “Who’s Bruce Wayne?” A hand comes up to cradle Bruce’s jaw, his cheeks heating up as he gets to take note just how big Clark’s hands are. It isn’t the first time he’s noticed. ------ Clark comes over to the Wayne Manor after his late work day at The Daily Planet and gets introspective with his concerns over Bruce. It turns into Bruce getting the urge to make the first move for a landmark in their relationship.
